titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on jacquard cards and other cards used as jacquard cards.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3526)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/23/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on: (1) cards, not punched, suitable for use as, or in making, jacquard cards; and (2) jacquard cards and jacquard heads for power-driven weaving machines and their parts.
